message.protectit.block_region_protected: A block(s) in that region are already protected.
message.protectit.block_region_not_owner: You are not the owner of that region.
message.protectit.block_region_not_prote: That region is not protected or you are not the owner.
message.protectit.invalid_coords_format: Block pos B must be >= than block pos A.
message.protectit.option_unavailable: That option is not available yet.
message.protectit.non_givable_item: That is not a valid item to give.
message.protectit.max_claims_met: You have already reached your max. number of claims.
label.protectit.claim_book.title: Claim Access Manifest
tooltip.protectit.claim_book.howto:
A players name to the manifast to allow them
access to interact or modify your land ie. a whitelist.
tooltip.protectit.claim.howto:
Place block to highlight area.
Use placed block to claim your land.
tooltip.protectit.remove_claim.howto:
Place block to highlight your claim.
Use placed block to remove your claim.
tooltip.protectit.claim_lever.howto:
Place lever within protected area.
Use placed block to highlight your land.
tooltip.protectit.claim_lectern.howto:
Place lectern within protected area.
Use Claim Access Manifest (CAM) on lectern to modify the access (whitelist) to your land.
You can generate a CAM by using a Book on the lectern.
